description: Purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts and accessories, services and supplies. Only Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI have been invited to participate, including 250 psia pressure transducers, 1000 psia pressure transducers and 2000 psia pressure transducers. Mandatory technical criteria includes lowest aggregate price.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Ruggedized High Temperature Pressure Transducers
### Tender Reference: CB-7334-61597267

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking bids for the purchase of **Ruggedized High Temperature Pressure Transducers** under the following terms and conditions:

- **Location**: The contract will be performed in Alberta, Canada.
- **Duration**: The contract duration will be from the contract award date to March 29, 2024.
- **Delivery Timeframe**: Deliveries will take place from the contract award date to March 29, 2024.

### Items Requested

- 250 psia pressure transducer: 1 unit
- 1000 psia pressure transducer: 5 units
- 2000 psia pressure transducer: 5 units

### Pre-qualification Requirements

Only suppliers pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada are eligible to bid. Suppliers must be able to provide evidence of their pre-qualification status.

### Selection Criteria

- The supplier with the lowest aggregate price that meets the mandatory technical criteria will be recommended for contract award.

### Mandatory Technical Criteria

- The supplier must be pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI

### Contact Information

Marie-Claude Rose
Government of Canada
marie-claude.rose@forces.gc.ca
(418) 929-0479

### Notice and Solicitation Documents

This notice is published on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for a period of 40 calendar days. The solicitation document is available on the CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) website. Suppliers must register on the website and download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D to access the bid.

Note: This tender is expired as per the information provided. The Government Tendering Service (GETS) notice URL is not provided, nor is the list of mandatory or sub-category notices. You may need to adjust according to the situation. The above info is just an example.
